articles.description: Amanze Egekeze poured in 28 points, including a go-ahead 3-pointer with 60 seconds left in the game, to propel Belmont to a 75-70 victory over Tennessee Tech on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Egekeze lifts Belmont to 75-70 win over Tennessee Tech

articles.description: Colorado State suspended interim head coach Steve Barnes just hours before Saturday's Mountain West game and assistant coach Jase Herl took his place, helping the team snap a seven-game losing streak with a 90-79 win over San Jose State.
articles.headline: Interim coach Steve Barnes suspended before game; assistant Jase Herl guides Rams to victory

articles.description: Chris Cokley had 15 points and nine rebounds and UAB rallied from nine down with less than four minutes to go for a 61-56 win on Saturday night.
articles.headline: UAB rallies past Rice 61-56

articles.description: The Tigers take down the Bulldogs 78-61 to earn their first sweep since the 1985-86 season.
articles.headline: No. 8 Auburn sweeps UGA in regular season

images.caption: The Tigers take down the Bulldogs 78-61 to earn their first sweep since the 1985-86 season.
images.name: No. 8 Auburn sweeps UGA in regular season

articles.description: Shakur Juiston scored 22 points and grabbed 14 rebounds and UNLV beat Wyoming 85-70 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Juiston leads UNLV past Wyoming 85-70

articles.description: Khalil Ahmad had 31 points and Kyle Allman added 21 and Cal State Fullerton made five free throws down the stretch to seal a 68-66 win over UC Davis on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Cal State Fullerton holds off UC Davis for 68-66 win
